website_summaries.verdict: Liquid Shredder’s sturdy, lightweight, vibrantly colored, and inexpensive Foamie surfboards are the perfect introductory board for youngsters and light use.
pros: An excellent surfboard for kids and beginners
cons: Unfortunately, this model is only made in a single size: 7 feet

customer_reviews.title: 5 starts. Great for beginners but also for newbie  surfers
customer_reviews.text: I love this surfboard. I have tried several soft top surfboads since i started surfing but this one is my favorite one. I have some experience now but I still use this surfboard. Great quality and firmness. It wont wobble, nice grasp
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Amazing board
customer_reviews.text: Excellent board. Used it for many days at Dayton beach in 2-6 foot waves and it worked wonders. I am a beginner surfer and I absolutely loved it. The leash plug and fins are very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter. Easy to maneuver and fun. I do t have a pic of her surfing but she can surf or use it as a paddle board.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not very well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in November for her birthday. She is finally able to use it. After three days it broke in half! Very disappointed little surfer girl. Anyone have a recommendation for a better board?
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kilada

customer_reviews.title: fun in the beginning but now creasing in half
customer_reviews.text: board was fun for a couple months but now is creasing in half down the middle after only 2 months of use and I’m only 150 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Allegra

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Actually have used it in backyard pool - super fun and good for balance/core workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boards are great for my grandkids
customer_reviews.text: These boards are great for my grandkids!(ages 7-13) They are able to carry them easily and are now avid beginning surfers.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sammons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. My daughter used it all summer and it held up great!!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest May

customer_reviews.title: Best surf board ever
customer_reviews.text: This board I cool best 200 dollars I've ever spent. If your under 175lb this is the board for you even if your 180lb
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: it has been great for my kid and he enjoys surfing every time ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a used surfboard from craigslist (no clue and completely ignorant). Unfortunately after a few months, it broke in the middle. So, I decided to get a new Liquid Shredder from Amazon.com. As a stay-at-home parent, I value price in everything I bought and with the $50 credit for opening a Amazon account, it made it more affordable. So far, it has been great for my kid and he enjoys surfing every time with his friends. The old one was water leak and making it too heavy to carry for my kid. Therefore, I advise parents to buy a surfboard at Amazon.com when asked. Thanks for the support.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver C.

customer_reviews.title: Light enough for my 8 & 10 year old daughters to carry
customer_reviews.text: Happy with board so far. We live on west coast FL so we don't have so many big waves but my daughter is having a blast learning basic surfing skills. It is a soft foam board but pretty thick so hopefully if she takes care of it and does not jump on it too hard, it will last a few years. Red color is vibrant and my 8 year old has a blue board that is a cool color too. So happy it is light enough that they can each carry down the path to our beach with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: D Johns

customer_reviews.title: but appears great quality and will last for years for beginner use
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet , but appears great quality and will last for years for beginner use. Got for my daughter who wants to learn to surf for and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: 5wood

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for a cheap toy kinda thing but not for the price. Even with small kids on it - it kinda went below the water line- didn't float so well and the fins on the back are removable but unfortunately they also come off by themselves. The kids climbed on it so it ended up being a really expensive floaty.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 year old son who was learning to surf. It has been a great board for beginners. Decent quality, seems to be holding up just fine. I would definitely recommend this product if you are looking for an inexpensive surf board.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Junky and Cheap
customer_reviews.text: You could get a piece of styrofoam and stand on it for close to the same amount of precision.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ogilvy

product_meta.title: Liquid Shredder 70 FSE EPS/PE Soft Surf Board
product_meta.description:
Based on traditional Funshape with performace refinements

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Liquid Shredder FSE 7ft Hybrid Soft Surfboard
feature_bullets: Liquid Shredder Brand economy FSE Series Foamie 7ft x 20in x 2.75in Novice rider weight 140lbs more for experienced riders
Foam (EPE) soft foamie deck. Slick, superfast bottom and wooden stringers for stiffness. 90 Day non-Commercial use Warranty through Liquid Shredder.
EPE Deck with EPS core and PP hard slick bottom. Heat laminated into a cost effective hi-performance Soft Surfboard
White PP (polypropylene) slick bottom adds rigidity and strength
Colorful soft EPE (expanded Polyethylene) adds comfort and anti slip texture when wet.
